channel.title: Need pro help
channel.description:
Hi, what i need today is I need somebody to help me figure out where to edit the npc's speeches, like the pure shop instead of saying "pure gear" I want it to say; "ownage gear here" or something like that.
Also, i need the spawed item code 0837 to be range based cuz its a crossbow but it trains str and it works in server and everything. ;D :| :confused: :o :P :rolleyes: :cool: :eek: :( :mad: :D ;) :)

item.title: Need pro help
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“Holy Str, post:5, topic:195488”][quote author=monger link=topic=259957.msg2156161#msg2156161 date=1207188202]
Search your NPChandler.java for the speech you want to change, then replace it or delete it.

For the strength training, it depends on your source.
[/quote]

i just told you how to do it

Its proj. czar…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need pro help
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

easy with the emotes… its in ur npchandler, look for npc id for w.e npc u want it to say. change save compile… and if its a brand new npc then theres much more steps to do this. I recommend reading some tuts…

Read full topic
